algorithmHints.mcts: MCTS is smarter but slower. If it's too slow, choose "Smart Strategy Algorithm" (Fast Mode)
algorithmHints.simple: Strategy only affects simple algorithm. MCTS automatically learns optimal strategy

dealingAlgorithmHint: Choose dealing strategy, affects game difficulty and fun
skipDealingAnimationHint: Check to start game directly without dealing animation
dealingSpeedHint: Control the speed of dealing animation

training.title: Training Mode
training.description: Click the button below to enter training configuration panel, set training parameters and start training.
training.mctsIterationsHint: Use more iterations during training for more accurate results (default 200, 50 during gameplay)
training.mctsDepthHint: Use deeper simulation during training for more accurate results (default 50, 20 during gameplay)
training.autoTuneHint: Automatically test multiple parameter combinations to find the best configuration (will increase training time)
training.tuneGamesPerConfigHint: Number of games to run for each parameter configuration, more is more accurate but slower (recommended: 50-100)

instructions.title: Training Instructions:
instructions.item1: Training will use full information mode (know all player hands)
instructions.item2: Training will record optimal decisions for different scenarios
instructions.item3: Training will generate optimization suggestions after completion
instructions.item4: Training progress will be displayed in real-time, can pause or stop at any time
instructions.item5: After training, parameters will be automatically fine-tuned, testing multiple configurations to find the best parameters
